achievement.desc: Escape from the Lich King in under 6 minutes.
achievement.title: We're Not Retreating; We're Advancing in a Different Direction.

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses in The Pit of Saron on Heroic difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Pit of Saron

achievement.desc: Clear the hallway before Scourgelord Tyrannus in The Pit of Saron on Heroic Difficulty without anyone taking icicle damage on the first try.
achievement.title: Don't Look Up

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses in The Forge of Souls on Heroic difficulty
achievement.title: Heroic: The Forge of Souls

achievement.desc: Defeat the Infinite Corruptor in The Culling of Stratholme on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Culling of Time

achievement.desc: Defeat Trollgore in Drak'Tharon Keep on Heroic Difficulty before Consume reaches ten stacks.
achievement.title: Consumption Junction

achievement.desc: Defeat Hadronox in Azjol-Nerub on Heroic Difficulty before he webs the top doors and prevents more creatures from spawning.
achievement.title: Hadronox Denied

achievement.desc: Defeat Ichoron in the Violet Hold on Heroic Difficulty without allowing any Ichor Globules to merge.
achievement.title: Dehydration

achievement.desc: Defeat Novos the Summoner in Drak'Tharon Keep on Heroic Difficulty without allowing any undead minions to reach the floor.
achievement.title: Oh Novos!

achievement.desc: Defeat Anub'arak in Azjol-Nerub on Heroic Difficulty in 4 minutes or less.
achievement.title: Gotta Go!

achievement.desc: Defeat Xevozz, Lavanthor, Ichoron, Zuramat the Obliterator, Erekem, and Moragg in The Violet Hold on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Lockdown!

achievement.desc: Engage King Dred in Drak'Tharon Keep on Heroic Difficulty and slay 6 Drakkari Gutrippers or Drakkari Scytheclaw during his defeat.
achievement.title: Better Off Dred

achievement.desc: Defeat Sjonnir the Ironshaper in the Halls of Stone on Heroic Difficulty and kill 5 Iron Sludges during the encounter.
achievement.title: Abuse the Ooze

achievement.desc: Defeat the Tribunal of Ages encounter in the Halls of Stone on Heroic Difficulty without allowing Brann Bronzebeard to take any damage.
achievement.title: Brann Spankin' New

achievement.desc: Defeat the Maiden of Grief in the Halls of Stone on Heroic Difficulty in 1 minute or less.
achievement.title: Good Grief

achievement.desc: Defeat Slad'ran in Gundrak on Heroic Difficulty without getting snake wrapped.
achievement.title: Snakes. Why'd It Have To Be Snakes?

achievement.desc: Defeat Zuramat the Obliterator in The Violet Hold on Heroic Difficulty without killing any void sentries.
achievement.title: A Void Dance

achievement.desc: Defeat the Gundrak bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Gundrak

achievement.desc: Defeat Gal'darah in Gundrak on Heroic Difficulty while under the effects of Eck Residue.
achievement.title: What the Eck?

achievement.desc: Defeat Jedoga Shadowseeker in Ahn'kahet on Heroic Difficulty without killing any Twilight Volunteers.
achievement.title: Volunteer Work

achievement.desc: Defeat the Azjol-Nerub bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Azjol-Nerub

achievement.desc: Defeat King Ymiron in Utgarde Pinnacle on Heroic Difficulty without anyone in the party triggering Bane.
achievement.title: King's Bane

achievement.desc: Defeat Skadi the Ruthless in Utgarde Pinnacle on Heroic Difficulty within 3 minutes of starting the gauntlet event.
achievement.title: Lodi Dodi We Loves the Skadi

achievement.desc: Defeat Skadi the Ruthless in Utgarde Pinnacle on Heroic Difficulty after having killed Grauf from 100% to dead in a single pass.
achievement.title: My Girl Loves to Skadi All the Time

achievement.desc: Force Svala Sorrowgrave to kill a Scourge Hulk on Heroic Difficulty in Utgarde Pinnacle.
achievement.title: The Incredible Hulk

achievement.desc: Defeat Prince Keleseth in Utgarde Keep on Heroic Difficulty without shattering any Frost Tombs.
achievement.title: On The Rocks

achievement.desc: Defeat the Ahn'kahet: The Old Kingdom bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Ahn'kahet: The Old Kingdom

achievement.desc: On three different visits to The Oculus, get credit for defeating Ley-Guardian Eregos while riding an Amber, Emerald, and Ruby drake on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Experienced Drake Rider

achievement.desc: Defeat The Nexus bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Nexus

achievement.desc: Defeat Keristrasza in The Nexus on Heroic Difficulty without allowing Intense Cold to reach more than two stacks.
achievement.title: Intense Cold

achievement.desc: Defeat Cyanigosa in The Violet Hold on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Violet Hold

achievement.desc: Defeat Cyanigosa in The Violet Hold without using Defense Control Crystals and with Prison Seal Integrity at 100% while in Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Defenseless

achievement.desc: Defeat the Utgarde Pinnacle bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Utgarde Pinnacle

achievement.desc: Defeat the Drak'Tharon Keep bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Drak'Tharon Keep

achievement.desc: Defeat the Caverns of Time: Stratholme bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Culling of Stratholme

achievement.desc: Defeat the boss encounters in the Halls of Stone on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Halls of Stone

achievement.desc: Defeat The Oculus bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: The Oculus

achievement.desc: Defeat the Halls of Lightning bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Halls of Lightning

achievement.desc: Defeat Loken in the Halls of Lightning on Heroic Difficulty in 2 minutes or less.
achievement.title: Timely Death

achievement.desc: Defeat Volkhan in the Halls of Lightning on Heroic Difficulty without allowing him to shatter more than 4 Brittle Golems.
achievement.title: Shatter Resistant

achievement.desc: Defeat General Bjarngrim in the Halls of Lightning on Heroic Difficulty while he has a Temporary Electrical Charge.
achievement.title: Lightning Struck

achievement.desc: Defeat the Utgarde Keep bosses on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Utgarde Keep

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses in the Trial of the Champion on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Heroic: Trial of the Champion

achievement.desc: Defeat Grand Magus Telestra in The Nexus on Heroic Difficulty after having killed her images within 5 seconds of each other during both splits.
achievement.title: Split Personality

achievement.desc: Defeat Anomalus in The Nexus on Heroic Difficulty without destroying any Chaotic Rifts.
achievement.title: Chaos Theory

achievement.desc: Defeat Krik'thir the Gatewatcher in Azjol-Nerub on Heroic Difficulty while Watcher Gashra, Watcher Narji, and Watcher Silthik are still alive.
achievement.title: Watch Him Die

achievement.desc: Defeat Herald Volazj in Ahn'kahet on Heroic Difficulty in 2 minutes or less.
achievement.title: Volazj's Quick Demise

achievement.desc: Defeat Elder Nadox in Ahn'kahet on Heroic Difficulty without killing any Ahn'kahar Guardians.
achievement.title: Respect Your Elders

achievement.desc: Defeat Gal'darah in Gundrak on Heroic Difficulty and have 5 unique party members get impaled throughout the fight.
achievement.title: Share The Love

achievement.desc: Defeat Moorabi in Gundrak on Heroic Difficulty while preventing him from transforming into a mammoth at any point during the encounter.
achievement.title: Less-rabi

achievement.desc: Kill 100 Risen Zombies in 1 minute in The Culling of Stratholme on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Zombiefest!

achievement.desc: Defeat Ley-Guardian Eregos in The Oculus on Heroic Difficulty within 20 minutes of Drakos the Interrogator's death.
achievement.title: Make It Count

achievement.desc: Defeat Ley-Guardian Eregos in The Oculus on Heroic Difficulty without anyone in your party using a Ruby Drake.
achievement.title: Ruby Void

achievement.desc: Defeat Ley-Guardian Eregos in The Oculus on Heroic Difficulty without anyone in your party using an Emerald Drake.
achievement.title: Emerald Void

achievement.desc: Defeat Ley-Guardian Eregos in The Oculus on Heroic Difficulty without anyone in your party using an Amber Drake.
achievement.title: Amber Void

achievement.desc: On separate visits to the Trial of the Champion, get credit for defeating Argent Confessor Paletress after suppressing five different memories of the past on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: Argent Confessor

achievement.desc: Defeat Eadric the Pure in the Trial of the Champion with his own hammer on Heroic Difficulty.
achievement.title: The Faceroller

achievement.desc: Defeat the Black Knight in the Trial of the Champion on Heroic Difficulty without any player in the group being hit by a ghoul explosion.
achievement.title: I've Had Worse

achievement.desc: Defeat Bronjahm in The Forge of Souls on Heroic Difficulty with at least 4 Corrupted Soul Fragments alive.
achievement.title: Soul Power

achievement.desc: Defeat the Devourer of Souls in The Forge of Souls on Heroic Difficulty without him successfully casting Phantom Blast.
achievement.title: Three Faced

achievement.desc: Defeat Forgemaster Garfrost in The Pit of Saron on Heroic Difficulty before any player gets 11 stacks of Permafrost.
achievement.title: Doesn't Go to Eleven

achievement.desc: Defeat Malygos in 6 minutes or less in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: You Don't Have An Eternity (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian without getting hit by Lava Strike in 10 player mode.
achievement.title: Gonna Go When the Volcano Blows (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Malygos with fewer than 9 in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: A Poke In The Eye (10 player)

achievement.desc: Within one raid lockout period, defeat every boss in Naxxramas without allowing any raid member to die during any of the boss encounters in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Undying

achievement.desc: Deliver a killing blow to a Scion of Eternity while riding on a hover disk in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Denyin' the Scion (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the 4 Horsemen in Naxxramas, ensuring that they all die within 15 seconds of each other in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: And They Would All Go Down Together (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Patchwerk in Naxxramas in 3 minutes or less in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Make Quick Werk Of Him (10 player)

achievement.desc: With at least one Twilight Drake still alive, engage and defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Twilight Assist (10 player)

achievement.desc: With at least two Twilight Drakes still alive, engage and defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Twilight Duo (10 player)

achievement.desc: With all three Twilight Drakes still alive, engage and defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Twilight Zone (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of Naxxramas with less than 9 people in the zone in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Dedicated Few (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Kel'Thuzad in Naxxramas while killing at least 18 abominations in his chamber in 10 player mode.
achievement.title: Just Can't Get Enough (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Sapphiron in Naxxramas without any member of the raid having a frost resist value over 100 in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Hundred Club (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Thaddius in Naxxramas without anyone in the raid crossing the negative and positive charges in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Shocking! (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Thaddius in Naxxramas with less than 9 players in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Subtraction (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Grand Widow Faerlina in Naxxramas without dispelling or preventing frenzy in 10 player mode.
achievement.title: Momma Said Knock You Out (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Malygos in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Spellweaver's Downfall (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Kel'Thuzad in Naxxramas in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Kel'Thuzad's Defeat (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat every boss in Naxxramas in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Fall of Naxxramas (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Sapphiron in Naxxramas in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Sapphiron's Demise (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Military Quarter of Naxxramas in 10 player mode.
achievement.title: The Military Quarter (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Construct Quarter of Naxxramas in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Construct Quarter (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Heigan the Unclean in Naxxramas without anyone in the raid dying in 10 player mode.
achievement.title: The Safety Dance (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Maexxna in Naxxramas within 20 minutes of Anub'Rekhan's death in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Arachnophobia (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Besting the Black Dragonflight (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Arachnid Quarter of Naxxramas in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Arachnid Quarter (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Plague Quarter of Naxxramas in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Plague Quarter (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian and the Twilight Drakes with fewer than 9 players in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Less Is More (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Loatheb in Naxxramas without killing any spores in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Spore Loser (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Onyxia in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Onyxia's Lair (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Onyxia in less than 5 minutes in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: More Dots! (10 player)

achievement.desc: Cause 50 Onyxia Whelplings to hatch within 10 seconds of Onyxia's liftoff, and then defeat her in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Many Whelps! Handle It! (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Onyxia without anyone taking damage from a Deep Breath in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: She Deep Breaths More (10 player)

achievement.desc: Cause 50 Onyxia Whelplings to hatch within 10 seconds of Onyxia's liftoff, and then defeat her in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Many Whelps! Handle It! (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Onyxia in less than 5 minutes in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: More Dots! (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Onyxia without anyone taking damage from a Deep Breath in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: She Deep Breaths More (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Onyxia in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Onyxia's Lair (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Loatheb in Naxxramas without killing any spores in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Spore Loser (25 player)

achievement.desc: Kill Patchwerk in Naxxramas in 3 minutes or less in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Make Quick Werk Of Him (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Malygos with fewer than 21 in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: A Poke In The Eye (25 player)

achievement.desc: Deliver a killing blow to a Scion of Eternity while riding on a hover disk in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Denyin' the Scion (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of Naxxramas with less than 21 people in the zone in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Dedicated Few (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Thaddius in Naxxramas with less than 21 players in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Subtraction (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian without getting hit by Lava Strike in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Gonna Go When the Volcano Blows (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian and the Twilight Drakes with fewer than 21 players in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Less Is More (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Malygos in 6 minutes or less in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: You Don't Have An Eternity (25 player)

achievement.desc: Within one raid lockout period, defeat every boss in Naxxramas without allowing any raid member to die during any of the boss encounters in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Immortal

achievement.desc: Defeat Grand Widow Faerlina in Naxxramas without dispelling or preventing frenzy in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Momma Said Knock You Out (25 player)

achievement.desc: With all three Twilight Drakes still alive, engage and defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Twilight Zone (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Kel'Thuzad in Naxxramas while killing at least 18 abominations in his chamber in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Just Can't Get Enough (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Sapphiron in Naxxramas without any member of the raid having a frost resist value over 100 in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Hundred Club (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the 4 Horsemen in Naxxramas, ensuring that they all die within 15 seconds of each other in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: And They Would All Go Down Together (25 player)

achievement.desc: Kill Maexxna in Naxxramas within 20 minutes of Anub'Rekhan's death in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Arachnophobia (25 player)

achievement.desc: With at least one Twilight Drake still alive, engage and defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Twilight Assist (25 player)

achievement.desc: With at least two Twilight Drakes still alive, engage and defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Twilight Duo (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Malygos in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Spellweaver's Downfall (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Kel'Thuzad in Naxxramas in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Kel'Thuzad's Defeat (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat every boss in Naxxramas in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Fall of Naxxramas (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Sapphiron in Naxxramas in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Sapphiron's Demise (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Construct Quarter of Naxxramas in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Construct Quarter (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Thaddius in Naxxramas without anyone in the raid crossing the negative and positive charges in 25 player mode.
achievement.title: Shocking! (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Military Quarter of Naxxramas in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Military Quarter (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Plague Quarter of Naxxramas in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Plague Quarter (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Heigan the Unclean in Naxxramas without anyone in the raid dying in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Safety Dance (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Arachnid Quarter of Naxxramas in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Arachnid Quarter (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Sartharion the Onyx Guardian in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Besting the Black Dragonflight (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Thorim without any raid member being struck by Lightning Charge in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Don't Stand in the Lightning (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat XT-002 Deconstructor in 205 seconds in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Must Deconstruct Faster (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Mimiron without anyone in the raid being hit by the following in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Set Up Us the Bomb (10 player)

achievement.desc: Force Mimiron to kill an Assault Bot with a Rocket Strike in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Not-So-Friendly Fire (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Algalon the Observer in 10-player mode without any raid member dying to Algalon at any point during that raid lockout period.
achievement.title: He Feeds On Your Tears (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the Assembly of Iron with Runemaster Molgeim as the last member alive in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: I Choose You, Runemaster Molgeim (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Yogg-Saron without the assistance of any Keepers in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Alone in the Darkness (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Yogg-Saron with the assistance of three or fewer Keepers in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Three Lights in the Darkness (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Yogg-Saron with the assistance of two or fewer Keepers in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Two Lights in the Darkness (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Yogg-Saron with the assistance of one or fewer Keepers in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: One Light in the Darkness (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Kologarn after causing at least 25 Rubble creatures to spawn in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Rubble and Roll (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Flame Leviathan while in each of the following vehicles in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Three Car Garage (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat each boss in Ulduar in 10-player mode without allowing any raid member to die to that boss at any point during that raid lockout period.
achievement.title: Champion of Ulduar

achievement.desc: Defeat Ignis the Furnace Master after shattering 2 Iron Constructs within 5 seconds in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Shattered (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Ignis the Furnace Master in 4 minutes in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Stokin' the Furnace (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat 25 Dark Rune Guardian Dwarves with Razorscale's Flame Breath in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Iron Dwarf, Medium Rare (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the Assembly of Iron with Stormcaller Brundir as the last member alive in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: I Choose You, Stormcaller Brundir (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat General Vezax without any raid member being hit by Shadow Crash in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Shadowdodger (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Mimiron after activating his Self-Destruct mechanism in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Firefighter (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the Feral Defender while defeating Auriaya in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Nine Lives (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat XT-002 Deconstructor without any raid member dying from a Gravity Bomb in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Nerf Gravity Bombs (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Algalon the Observer in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Observed (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Thorim while under the effect of Aura of Celerity in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Who Needs Bloodlust? (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Freya within 20 minutes of the first creature you kill in the Conservatory of Life in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Con-speed-atory (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Hodir without any raid member having more than 2 stacks of Biting Cold in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Getting Cold in Here (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Kologarn without any raid member being hit by Focused Eyebeams in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: If Looks Could Kill (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Auriaya without destroying her Sanctum Sentries in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Crazy Cat Lady (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Kologarn without destroying either of his arms in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: With Open Arms (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Flame Leviathan with all 4 Orbital Defense Systems active in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Orbit-uary (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Flame Leviathan with at least 1 Orbital Defense System active in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Orbital Bombardment (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Flame Leviathan with at least 2 Orbital Defense Systems active in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Orbital Devastation (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Flame Leviathan with at least 3 Orbital Defense Systems active in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Nuked from Orbit (10 player)

achievement.desc: Experience all 3 visions of Yogg-Saron's mind in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: In His House He Waits Dreaming (10 player)

criteria.name: The Forging of the Demon Soul

achievement.desc: Defeat General Vezax after defeating the Saronite Animus in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: I Love the Smell of Saronite in the Morning (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Freya while leaving all 3 Elders alive in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Knock, Knock, Knock on Wood (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Freya while leaving at least 1 Elder alive in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Knock on Wood (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Freya while leaving at least 2 Elders alive in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Knock, Knock on Wood (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the Assembly of Iron while under the effect of an Iron Boot Flask in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: But I'm On Your Side (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the Assembly of Iron without allowing Stormcaller Brundir to damage anyone with Chain Lightning or Lightning Whirl in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Can't Do That While Stunned (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat XT-002 Deconstructor without him recovering any health from XS-013 in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Nerf Engineering (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat XT-002 Deconstructor after destroying his heart in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Heartbreaker (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Descent into Madness area of Ulduar in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Descent into Madness (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat every boss in Ulduar in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Secrets of Ulduar (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Yogg-Saron without any raid member going insane in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Drive Me Crazy (10 player)

achievement.desc: /Kiss Sara in Ulduar while she is angry with you in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Kiss and Make Up (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the Keeper bosses of Ulduar in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Keepers of Ulduar (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Freya while she is affected by 25 stacks of Attuned to Nature in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Getting Back to Nature (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Thorim, the Ancient Rune Giant and the Runic Colossus in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: I'll Take You All On (10 player)

criteria.name: Participate in slaying Ancient Rune Giant

achievement.desc: Defeat Thorim while Sif is present in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Lose Your Illusion (10 player)

achievement.desc: Force Thorim to enter the arena while Sif is present in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Siffed (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Hodir without any raid member being hit by Flash Freeze in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Cheese the Freeze (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Hodir without any friendly NPC dying in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: I Have the Coolest Friends (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Hodir before he shatters his rare cache in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: I Could Say That This Cache Was Rare (10 player)

achievement.desc: Possess the effects of Toasty Fire, Storm Power and Starlight at the same time in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Staying Buffed All Winter (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Antechamber area of Ulduar in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Antechamber of Ulduar (10 player)

achievement.desc: Destroy both of Kologarn's arms and then Kologarn himself within 12 seconds in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Disarmed (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the Assembly of Iron with Steelbreaker as the last member alive in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: I Choose You, Steelbreaker (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Siege area of Ulduar in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Siege of Ulduar (10 player)

achievement.desc: Survive being thrown into Ignis the Furnace Master's Slag Pot in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Hot Pocket (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Razorscale without allowing her to fly into the air more than once in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: A Quick Shave (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Flame Leviathan on the first try without anyone repairing their vehicle in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Unbroken (10 player)

achievement.desc: Destroy 100 Steelforged Defenders in 10 seconds on the Ulduar gauntlet in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Dwarfageddon (10 player)

achievement.desc: Destroy a Flame Leviathan Defense Turret in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Take Out Those Turrets (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Flame Leviathan without causing a System Shutdown in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Shutout (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat 20 XS-013 Scrapbots within 12 seconds using XE-321 Boombots in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Nerf Scrapbots (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Elder Brightleaf, Elder Ironbranch and Elder Stonebark within 15 seconds of each other in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Lumberjacked (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat 2 Ancient Water Spirits, 2 Storm Lashers and 2 Snaplashers within 10 seconds in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Deforestation (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Yogg-Saron within 7 minutes in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: He's Not Getting Any Older (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat 9 Guardians of Yogg-Saron within 12 seconds in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: They're Coming Out of the Walls (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Algalon the Observer after closing 3 Black Holes within 10 seconds in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Supermassive (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Algalon the Observer in 10-player mode without anyone in the raid wearing any equipment with an item level higher than is available in 10-player Ulduar.
achievement.reward: Title Reward: Herald of the Titans
achievement.title: Herald of the Titans

achievement.desc: Defeat the Assembly of Iron while under the effect of an Iron Boot Flask in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: But I'm On Your Side (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Flame Leviathan on the first try without anyone repairing their vehicle in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Unbroken (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Flame Leviathan without causing a System Shutdown in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Shutout (25 player)

achievement.desc: /Kiss Sara in Ulduar while she is angry with you in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Kiss and Make Up (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Siege area of Ulduar in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Siege of Ulduar (25 player)

achievement.desc: Survive being thrown into Ignis the Furnace Master's Slag Pot in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Hot Pocket (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the Keeper bosses of Ulduar in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Keepers of Ulduar (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Thorim, the Ancient Rune Giant and the Runic Colossus in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: I'll Take You All On (25 player)

criteria.name: Participate in slaying Ancient Rune Giant

achievement.desc: Force Mimiron to kill an Assault Bot with a Rocket Strike in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Not-So-Friendly Fire (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Antechamber area of Ulduar in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Antechamber of Ulduar (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Auriaya without destroying her Sanctum Sentries in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Crazy Cat Lady (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Hodir without any friendly NPC dying in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: I Have the Coolest Friends (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the Assembly of Iron with Runemaster Molgeim as the last member alive in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: I Choose You, Runemaster Molgeim (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat XT-002 Deconstructor without any raid member dying from a Gravity Bomb in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Nerf Gravity Bombs (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Razorscale without allowing her to fly into the air more than once in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: A Quick Shave (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat every boss in the Trial of the Grand Crusader in 10-player Heroic mode.
achievement.title: Call of the Grand Crusade (10 player)

criteria.name: Complete the Trial of the Grand Crusader

achievement.desc: In the Trial of the Grand Crusader, reach a Tribute Chest with 50 attempts remaining in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: A Tribute to Insanity (10 player)

achievement.desc: In the Trial of the Grand Crusader, reach a Tribute Chest with at least 25 attempts remaining in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: A Tribute to Skill (10 player)

achievement.desc: In the Trial of the Grand Crusader, reach a Tribute Chest with at least 45 attempts remaining in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: A Tribute to Mad Skill (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat every boss in the Trial of the Crusader in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Call of the Crusade (10 player)

criteria.name: Complete the Trial of the Crusader

achievement.desc: Defeat the Twin Val'kyr in 3 minutes or less in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Salt and Pepper (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Lord Jaraxxus while at least two Mistresses of Pain are alive in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Three Sixty Pain Spike (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Icehowl while at least 2 Snobolds remain alive in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Upper Back Pain (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Acidmaw and Dreadscale within 10 seconds of each other in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Not One, But Two Jormungars (10 player)

achievement.desc: Kill all the enemy heroes within 60 seconds of the first one dying in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Resilience Will Fix It (10 player)

achievement.desc: Kill 40 Swarm Scarabs within 30 seconds in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Traitor King (10 player)

achievement.desc: Meet the criteria for A Tribute to Insanity without any raid member having used an item only obtainable from 25-player Coliseum, or any more powerful item.
achievement.title: A Tribute to Dedicated Insanity

achievement.desc: Kill 40 Swarm Scarabs within 30 seconds in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: The Traitor King (25 player)

achievement.desc: In the Trial of the Grand Crusader, reach a Tribute Chest with 50 attempts remaining in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: A Tribute to Insanity (25 player)

achievement.desc: In the Trial of the Grand Crusader, reach a Tribute Chest with at least 25 attempts remaining in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: A Tribute to Skill (25 player)

achievement.desc: In the Trial of the Grand Crusader, reach a Tribute Chest with at least 45 attempts remaining in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: A Tribute to Mad Skill (25 player)

achievement.title: Call of the Grand Crusade (25 player)

achievement.title: Resilience Will Fix It (25 player)

achievement.title: Three Sixty Pain Spike (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Icehowl while at least 4 Snobolds remain alive in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Upper Back Pain (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Acidmaw and Dreadscale within 10 seconds of each other in 25-player mode.
achievement.title: Not One, But Two Jormungars (25 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the first four bosses in Icecrown Citadel in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Storming the Citadel (10 player)

criteria.name: Claim victory in the Gunship Battle

achievement.desc: Defeat the Deathbringer before Mark of the Fallen Champion is cast three times in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: I've Gone and Made a Mess (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the first four bosses in Icecrown Citadel in 10-player Heroic mode.
achievement.title: Heroic: Storming the Citadel (10 player)

criteria.name: Claim victory in the Gunship Battle

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Plagueworks in Icecrown Citadel in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Plagueworks (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Crimson Hall in Icecrown Citadel in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Crimson Hall (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the bosses of The Frostwing Halls in Icecrown Citadel in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Frostwing Halls (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the Lich King in Icecrown Citadel in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Frozen Throne (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat every boss in Icecrown Citadel in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Fall of the Lich King (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Lord Marrowgar without any raid member remaining impaled for more than 8 seconds in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Boned (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Lady Deathwhisper with at least five different types of Cultists active at the time of her demise in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Full House (10 player)

achievement.desc: Claim victory in the Gunship Battle without any raid member visiting the enemy gunship more than once in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: I'm on a Boat (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Rotface without a Big Ooze casting Unstable Ooze Explosion in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Dances with Oozes (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Festergut while none of the players in your raid group ever had 3 stacks of Inoculated in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Flu Shot Shortage (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Professor Putricide without using Regurgitated Ooze on the Abomination in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Nausea, Heartburn, Indigestion... (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat the Blood Council without anyone in the raid taking more than 23,000 spell damage in a single hit in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: The Orb Whisperer (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Blood-Queen Lana'thel once as a vampire and again without becoming a vampire in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Once Bitten, Twice Shy (10 player)

criteria.name: Defeat Blood-Queen Lana'thel without becoming a vampire
Defeat Blood-Queen Lana'thel while a vampire

achievement.desc: Enter every portal spawned by Valithria Dreamwalker before healing her to full health in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Portal Jockey (10 player)

achievement.desc: Defeat Sindragosa in 10-player mode without any member of your raid receiving more than 4 stacks of Mystic Buffet.
achievement.title: All You Can Eat (10 player)

achievement.desc: Allow Necrotic Plague to stack to 30 before defeating the Lich King in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Been Waiting a Long Time for This (10 player)

achievement.desc: Kill every Vile Spirit that spawns before it explodes and then defeat the Lich King in 10-player mode.
achievement.title: Neck-Deep in Vile (10 player)
